Description: On VA-7 in the County of Loudoun, in the vicinity of Potomac View Rd; Rt. 637S (Loudoun County), motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. The west left shoulder, left lane, and center lane are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Vehicle Crash

Description: On I-64 East at mile marker 283 in the City of Norfolk, near Virginia Beach Boulevard, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Disabled Vehicle

Description: On I-64 at mile marker 205.5 in the County of New Kent, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The east right shoulder is closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Disabled Vehicle
